name: Our Great Revolution!
storyline: The main character of the game is a young man who lives in a certain kingdom. Due to poor harvest, he directly appeals to the king to reduce his annual tribute. However, the King declares, "Rather, it is an important time to come, so it has been decided to pay more taxes." At this rate, everyone will starve. The young man, who thought that he might not have been heard by the king because he came alone, gathered as many friends as possible and decided to appeal directly to the king again ....
summary:
It's a game where you gather friends and make a long line.
However, you cannot slip through the companions who follow you.

How many people can you collect without getting caught by your friends !?
